14 Mar 2013, Senate Motions — Renewable Energy Certificates

  • Summary

This division relates to the policy positions Offshore processing and provisional (provisional).

Christine Milne voted with the majority (No).

About the Project

The Public Whip is brought to you by the not-for-profit OpenAustralia Foundation. It is based on the UK site of the same name.

If you'd like to talk to us about the project, please email us.
